revised_title: Neutron and Proton Scattering by Deuterons
tldr: The authors extended the theoretical treatment of neutron-deuteron collisions to include protons and deuterons, exploring the scattering of neutrons and protons with energies up to 16. The study compared experimental evidence with calculated results, supporting the charge independence of nuclear forces and favoring symmetrical exchange forces. The research also discussed iterative methods for solving numerical integro-differential equations related to these types of collisions.
